verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
LOVE SO GREAT
Words and Music by
JOSHUA GRIMMETT,
REUBEN MORGAN & JAMIE SNELL
â™©= 92

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
VERSE: 1
Your love so great, Jesus in all things
I've seen a glimpse of Your heart
H/D# F#
A billion years, still I'll be singing
How can I praise You enough?
How can I praise You enough?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
You are the Lord Almighty
F# G#m7
Outshining all the stars in glory
Your love is like the wildest ocean
Oh nothing else compares

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
VERSE: 2
Creation calls all to the Saviour
We are alive for Your praise
In earth and sky, no one is higher
Our God of wonders, You reign
Our God of wonders, You reign
Repeat CHORUS twice

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
INSTRUMENTAL:
BRIDGE: 1
Not to us, but to Your Name
We lift up all praise
Not to us, but to Your Name
We lift up all praise

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
BRIDGE: 2
G#m7 E H
Not to us, but to Your Name
G#m7 E H
We lift up all praise
G#m7 E H
Not to us, but to Your Name
G#m7 E H
We lift up all praise
Repeat CHORUS: twice

verse.name: b3
verse.lines:
BRIDGE: 3
Not to us, but to Your Name
H Hsus H
We lift up all praise
Not to us, but to Your Name
H Hsus H
We lift up all praise

verse.name: b4
verse.lines:
Repeat BRIDGE: 2 twice
Repeat CHORUS: twice
